result.text: The foundation and hope of China-U.S. relations lies with the people, the future lies with the youth, and the vitality lies with sub-national entities. So says President Xi. I spoke with someone who has dedicated the past 30 years to cementing the bond between two beautiful coastal cities, Long Beach, California, and Qingdao in East China's Shandong Province. What stories has she witnessed?

result.text: To my fellow journalists, on this Journalists' Day, I take a moment to reflect. With almost three decades of experience in my rearview, I derive a deep sense of satisfaction from venturing to the frontlines and presenting the world with unbiased and genuine narratives. My bags are packed, and I stand ready for my reporting assignment this week. Keep an eye out for my reports from a different continent.

Secretary-General of the @UN.

We will never, ever give up making this world better for everyone, everywhere.
legacy.name: António Guterres

legacy.full_text:
The need for a humanitarian ceasefire in Gaza is getting more urgent with every passing hour.

The parties to the conflict & the international community face an immediate & fundamental responsibility:

Stop this inhuman collective suffering & dramatically expand humanitarian aid.

legacy.full_text:
I am deeply concerned about clear violations of international humanitarian law that we are witnessing in the Middle East.

The protection of civilians must be paramount.

They are #NotATarget.

Nobody is above international humanitarian law.

Secretary-General of the @UN.

We will never, ever give up making this world better for everyone, everywhere.
legacy.name: António Guterres

legacy.full_text:
I reiterate my utter condemnation of the abhorrent acts of terror perpetrated by Hamas on 7 October & repeat my call for the immediate, unconditional & safe release of hostages held in Gaza.

Nothing can justify the deliberate torture, killing, injuring & kidnapping of civilians.
